name: A Grand Show (Demo) (Outdated)
description:
A Grand Show is a platformer that I'm creating using Game Maker: Studio. Most of the features are currently implemented and shown in this demo. The goal of the game is to collect all the Star Shards and beat 4 bosses to face the final boss! The demo consists of a working Co-op mode {Not entirely finished but functional!}, 5 rooms to try out stuff, and a boss! If you're playing Solo, you can choose to play as either Crimson or Azure, while in Co-op mode you'll play as both!

Default keyboard controls are:

X, C, arrow keys.

If two players are using the keyboard, it becomes:

Player 1: O,P, Arrow Keys

Player 2: F, G, WASD.

The game will auto-detect XBox360 type controllers and use those instead. I can't garanatee it will work with more then one controller or any other kind of controller, sorry!

Please leave a comment if you find any bugs/problems or what you enjoyed/didn't, if you'd like!!! Thank you for your time!
